# se-list-item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                               | Type                                             | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `itemTitle` | `item-title` | Define if the list element should be selected or not                                      | `string`                                         | `undefined` |
| `mode`      | `mode`       | Define the them of the list. This them will be handled and modified by the parent element | `"checkbox" \| "classic" \| "expander" \| "nav"` | `undefined` |
| `selected`  | `selected`   | Define if the list element should be selected or not                                      | `boolean`                                        | `undefined` |
